script: There is a Statue of Founder in the center of my hometown.
Hospital is a location in my home town, it is 2 KM, North from Statue of Founder.
I visited Playground, which is 1 KM, North from Hospital.
I visited Library, which is 3 KM, South from Playground.
Park is a location in my home town, it is 1 KM, North from Library.
I visited High Street, which is 1 KM, South from Park.
And finally there is Town Hall which is West from High Street and 1 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Statue of Founder to Town Hall following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
From Statue of Founder, go 2km North to Hospital.
From Hospital, go 1km North to Playground.
From Playground, go 3km South to Library.
From Library, go 1km North to Park.
From Park, go 1km South to High Street.
From High Street, go 1km West to Town Hall.
